name: Sun
description: It is a yellow dwarf star at the center of our system. Formed 4.6 billion years ago, it is the oldest and most massive object here.

name: Mercury
description: It is the smallest planet and the closest to the Sun. It has a cratered surface and experiences extreme temperature shifts between day and night.

name: Venus
description: It is the hottest planet due to a thick, toxic atmosphere. It rotates very slowly in the opposite direction compared to most other planets.

name: Earth
description: It is the only known planet that supports life and liquid water. It has a protective atmosphere and a diverse range of active ecosystems.

name: Mars
description: It is known as the Red Planet due to iron oxide. It features giant volcanoes, deep canyons, and evidence of ancient water flows on surface.

name: Jupiter
description: It is the largest planet and a massive gas giant. It has a famous Great Red Spot and dozens of moons orbiting its gravity.

name: Saturn
description: It is a gas giant famous for its complex system of icy rings. It is the least dense planet and has many unique moons.

name: Uranus
description: It is an ice giant with a unique tilt, rotating on its side. It has a faint ring system and a very cold atmosphere.

name: Neptune
description: It is the farthest planet and a dark, cold ice giant. It experiences the strongest winds in the solar system and appears bright blue.
